content: APT28 (Fancy Bear, Sofacy) is a Russian state-sponsored threat group. TTPs: Spearphishing, credential harvesting, custom malware (X-Agent, Sofacy). Targets: Government, military, critical infrastructure. MITRE ATT&CK: T1566 (Phishing), T1078 (Valid Accounts), T1055 (Process Injection). Known campaigns: 2016 US election interference, Olympic Destroyer.

APT29 (Cozy Bear, The Dukes) is a Russian intelligence-linked group. TTPs: WMI persistence, PowerShell backdoors, cloud service abuse. Malware: WellMess, WellMail, SUNBURST (SolarWinds). Targets: Government, think tanks, healthcare. MITRE ATT&CK: T1047 (WMI), T1059.001 (PowerShell), T1199 (Trusted Relationship).

Lazarus Group is a North Korean state-sponsored APT. TTPs: Supply chain attacks, cryptocurrency theft, destructive malware. Notable attacks: WannaCry ransomware, Sony Pictures hack, SWIFT banking heists. Malware families: Destover, RATANKBA, AppleJeus. MITRE ATT&CK: T1195 (Supply Chain Compromise), T1486 (Data Encrypted for Impact).

Cl0p ransomware group specializes in big-game hunting and double extortion. TTPs: Zero-day exploitation (MOVEit, Accellion FTA, GoAnywhere), data exfiltration before encryption. Attack chain: Initial access via web exploit → data theft → ransomware deployment. Known for exploiting CVE-2023-34362 (MOVEit), CVE-2021-27101 (Accellion).
